statements: SELECT * FROM catering_menus;
SELECT menu_name, menu_description FROM catering_menus WHERE menu_id = 1;
SELECT menu_id, menu_name, menu_items FROM catering_menus WHERE menu_id > 2;
SELECT menu_name, menu_description FROM catering_menus WHERE menu_name LIKE 'Vegetarian%';
SELECT menu_id, menu_name, menu_description FROM catering_menus ORDER BY menu_id DESC;
SELECT menu_id, menu_name FROM catering_menus WHERE menu_id > 100 ORDER BY menu_id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT menu_name, menu_description FROM catering_menus WHERE menu_items->>'type' = 'salad'
SELECT * FROM catering_menus WHERE menu_id < 50 AND menu_description IS NOT NULL
SELECT menu_id, menu_name FROM catering_menus WHERE menu_items->>'price'::numeric > 10 ORDER BY menu_id
SELECT menu_name, menu_description, menu_items -> 'vegetarian' AS is_vegetarian FROM catering_menus WHERE menu_items ? 'vegetarian'
SELECT * FROM catering_menus;
SELECT menu_name, menu_price FROM catering_menus WHERE menu_price > 50;
SELECT menu_name, menu_description FROM catering_menus WHERE menu_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM catering_menus ORDER BY menu_price DESC;
SELECT menu_name, menu_price, menu_description FROM catering_menus WHERE menu_id IN (1, 4);
SELECT * FROM catering_menus WHERE menu_price > 50.00 ORDER BY menu_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT event_date, start_time, end_time, event_location FROM event_schedules WHERE event_id = 2;
SELECT menu_name, menu_description FROM catering_menus WHERE menu_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT menu_id, menu_name, menu_price FROM catering_menus WHERE menu_name LIKE '%veggie%' AND menu_price < 30.00;

SELECT client_id, event_date, start_time, end_time, event_location, menu_name FROM event_schedules JOIN catering_menus ON event_schedules.menu_id = catering_menus.menu_id WHERE event_date >= '2022-09-01' ORDER BY event_date, start_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM CateringMenus;
SELECT menu_name, menu_price FROM CateringMenus WHERE menu_price > 50;
SELECT menu_name, menu_description FROM CateringMenus ORDER BY menu_name DESC;
SELECT client_name, client_email FROM ClientDetails WHERE client_phone IS NULL;
SELECT event_id, event_date, event_location, event_type FROM EventSchedules WHERE event_location = 'Banquet Hall';
SELECT menu_name, menu_price FROM CateringMenus WHERE menu_price > 50 ORDER BY menu_price DESC;
SELECT event_id, event_date, event_location FROM EventSchedules WHERE event_type = 'Wedding';
SELECT client_name, client_email FROM ClientDetails WHERE client_phone IS NULL;
SELECT menu_name, menu_price, menu_description FROM CateringMenus WHERE menu_price BETWEEN 25 AND 75 ORDER BY menu_name ASC;
SELECT client_name, client_phone FROM ClientDetails WHERE client_email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM CateringMenus;
SELECT menu_id, menu_name, menu_price FROM CateringMenus ORDER BY menu_price DESC;
SELECT menu_name, menu_description FROM CateringMenus WHERE menu_price > 50;
SELECT * FROM EventSchedules WHERE event_date = '2022-12-31';
SELECT event_name, event_time FROM EventSchedules WHERE event_time BETWEEN '08:00:00' AND '12:00:00';
SELECT * FROM CateringMenus WHERE menu_price > 50 ORDER BY menu_name DESC;
SELECT menu_name, menu_price FROM CateringMenus WHERE menu_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY menu_price ASC;
SELECT event_name, event_date, event_time FROM EventSchedules WHERE event_date >= '2023-01-01' ORDER BY event_date, event_time;
SELECT client_name, client_email FROM ClientDetails WHERE client_phone LIKE '123%' ORDER BY client_name DESC;

SELECT E.event_name, C.client_name, C.client_phone FROM EventSchedules E JOIN EventClients EC ON E.event_id = EC.event_id JOIN ClientDetails C ON C.client_id = EC.client_id ORDER BY E.event_name ASC, C.client_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM catering_menus;
SELECT menu_name, menu_price FROM catering_menus WHERE menu_price > 50;
SELECT menu_name, menu_description FROM catering_menus ORDER BY menu_name DESC;
SELECT event_name FROM event_schedules WHERE event_date BETWEEN '2022-09-01' AND '2022-09-30';
SELECT client_name, client_email, client_phone FROM client_details WHERE client_address LIKE '%Main Street%';
SELECT menu_name, menu_description FROM catering_menus WHERE menu_price > 100.00
SELECT menu_name, menu_price FROM catering_menus WHERE menu_name LIKE '%Vegan%'
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM event_schedules WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY event_date ASC
SELECT client_name, client_email, client_phone FROM client_details ORDER BY client_name DESC
SELECT item_name, item_price FROM menu_items WHERE menu_id = 5
